channel.title: linked-list on Headstone lamp - Always has been
channel.description: Recent content in linked-list on Headstone lamp - Always has been

item.title: 206. Reverse Linked List
item.description: # O(n) time || O(1) space def reverse_list(self, head: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]: prev, curr = None, head while curr: curr.next, prev, curr = prev, curr, curr.next return prev traverse linked list using curr pointer. relink curr.next to prev each step on iteration. return the prev as head of reversed list

item.title: 876. Middle of the Linked List
item.description: # O(n) time || O(1) space def middle_node(self, head: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]: if not head.next: return head slow = fast = head while fast and fast.next: slow, fast = slow.next, fast.next.next return slow fast pointer traverse two times faster than slow, so when fast is done, slow is in middle of lined list
